text: Chart 17: Market Share by Application Usability - CY 2024
Source â€“ Imarc Research, CareEdge Research

The India In-Vitro Diagnostics (IVD) market, when segmented by application, is mainly driven by the infectious disease segment, which accounts for 45% of the market in CY24, reflecting its critical role in disease detection and management. Diabetes and cardiology follow with 10% and 9% shares, respectively, highlighting the growing demand for diagnostic solutions in managing chronic diseases. Cancer/oncology, nephrology, and autoimmune diseases contribute 8%, 7%, and 6%, respectively, underscoring the need for advanced diagnostic tools in specialized medical fields. The remaining 15% falls under other applications, demonstrating the broad scope of the IVD market.
